hero_section.description: Turn your abstract ideas into visual reality. I craft digital experiences that perform as beautifully as they look.

services.title: Custom Web Development from Scratch
services.description: From Design to Deployment: Creating responsive and dynamic websites using the latest technologies.

services.title: Build Website by your Design
services.description: Building user-friendly interfaces that enhance user experience.

services.title: Feature Integration
services.description: Add interactivity, animations, forms, or third-party API integrations to breathe life into your static pages.

services.title: Website Redesign
services.description: Modernize your legacy website. Improved performance, accessibility, and a fresh aesthetic to match current web standards.

portfolio_section.title: Selected Works
portfolio_section.description: A collection of projects that showcase my passion for building digital products.

projects.title: Institut for Electrochemistry, Galvanic and Materialchemistry
projects.description: A full-featured online store with cart, checkout, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Camp Currie
projects.description: A farmer-project website called Camp Currie. I worked on developing the front-end using React and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive and visually appealing design.

projects.title: Aktionsfinder App
projects.description: A mobile app that helps users find local deals and promotions in Austria.

projects.title: Tiroler Tageszeitung App
projects.description: A news app delivering the latest headlines and articles from Tiroler Tageszeitung. I worked on adding various functionalities and UI components including integrating Dark Mode.

projects.title: Protokoll on Demand App
projects.description: An on-demand mobile app for document management and sharing.

about_me_section.title: Hello World
about_me_section.description: I'm a passionate web developer dedicated to transforming ideas into stunning digital experiences. With a keen eye for design and a commitment to quality, I specialize in creating websites that not only look great but also perform flawlessly. Let's collaborate to bring your vision to life!

contact_section.title: Lets get in Touch
contact_section.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Contact me for a free consultation and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
